title: Beneficial Ownership Statement
description: A beneficial ownership statement is made up of an entity, an interested party (a reference to an entity, natural person, arrangement or trust), details of the interest and provenance information for the statement.

statementType.title: Statement type'
statementType.description: This should always be set to `beneficialOwnershipStatement`.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: The subject of a beneficial ownership relationship.

describedByEntityStatement.title: Described by entity statement
describedByEntityStatement.description: Provide the identifier of the statement which describes the entity that the subject of an ownership or control interest.

interestedParty.title: Interested party
interestedParty.description: The interested party has some level of ownership or control over the entity referenced in this beneficial ownership statement. This should be described with reference to either an entity statement or person statement, or, where the interestedParty is unknown, details of why.

describedByEntityStatement.title: Described by entity statement
describedByEntityStatement.description: A reference to a statement describing a registered entity, trust or arrangement that has an ownership or control interest in the subject of this beneficial ownership statement. An entityStatement should be used when the direct interests to be described represents known control or ownership by anyone other than a natural person.

describedByPersonStatement.title: Described by person statement
describedByPersonStatement.description: A reference to a statement describing a natural person who has an ownership or control interest in the subject of this beneficial ownership statement.

Unspecified.title: Unspecified or unknown party
Unspecified.description: When confirmation has been provided that no interested party exists, where beneficial ownership information does not need to be provided, or where defaults of beneficial ownership are unknown, details for this can be given. Where there is natural person with ownership or control, but their name or details are not known or cannot be disclosed for some reason, a personStatement should still be used, but identifying details of the person left blank.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason that no interested party can be .

description.title: Description
description.description: Any supporting information about the absence of a confirmed beneficial owner. This field may be used to provide set phrases from a source system, or for a free-text explanation.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: A description of the interests held by the interestedParty covered by this statement in the entity covered by this statement.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of the information that links the entity and the interested party, or that supports a null statement.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: Annotations about this statement or parts of this statement
